name: Wander Guy
description:
Thank you for visiting. This is my submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020. It's the first time I've ever submitted anything to a game jam, and also the first time I've ever programmed something for myself that wasn't for school or work.

I am the sole developer on this project. All credits for assets have been given in the Credits page inside the game. All assets were found for free on the Unity Asset Store.

Please enjoy.

Update: Bug fixes and exe packing.
